attributes.title: Wish I'd known of this APP sooner!

attributes.title: Great App!
attributes.review: The app is well made and is a nice all-in-one way to stay connected with the campaign! Go Trump!

attributes.title: This app makes you feel integrated in the campaign
attributes.review: I support Trump, and not Crooked Hilary ever!

attributes.title: Excellent App
attributes.review: This app allows u to be a part of the campaign.  Very easy navigate!

attributes.title: MAGA
attributes.review: Show your love for America by downloading this app and inviting your friends to do the same.

attributes.title: Awesome!!!
attributes.review: It's so addicting I just have to keep getting action points

attributes.title: MAGA
attributes.review:
Make America Great Again. Trump/Pence 2016.

Apple is censoring this app, just like Twitter and Google do. Corrupt just like the candidate they've bought.

attributes.title: MAGA
attributes.review: Well this just make my day. Trump news straight to my phone!

attributes.title: My phone exploded and Bald Eagle flew out
attributes.review: Purchased a new phone, would MAGA again.
